overview: The film is a result of more than a year research on the farm crisis, farmer suicides, pesticide poisoning, land grab and several other issues pushing farming into crisis. The research was done by our team headed by Mr. Anshul Sinha under the mentor ship of Dr. G. V. Ramanjaneyulu, Centre for Sustainable Agriculture, Hyderabad. The film portrays 25 major issues pushing farming into crisis.  The film aims at saving every farmer from giving up farming and their life and making others realize what is wrong with our approach to farming today and what are the possible ways out.
title: Mitti-back to roots
